title: Kim Kardashian rocks slouchy boots as she poses with daughter North, six, on a gold chair
text:
She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019.

And on Thursday, Kim Kardashian shared a sweet snap while posing with her eldest child North, six, while seated on a golden chair.

The 38-year-old reality star rocked slouchy boots while posing with North seated on her lap for the mother-daughter photo.

So sweet: on Thursday, Kim Kardashian shared a sweet snap while posing with her eldest child North, six, while seated on a golden chair

Kim looked incredible in black baggy bottoms that she tucked stylishly into her boots; she added a black top with a white accent along the top.

She wore her dark brunette tresses loose with pink nude lipstick on her full pout, adding smokey eye makeup to round out her look.

Kim posed while as she blew a kiss to the camera and North held up a peace sign; the duo posed on the gold chair, which sat in front of two ornate doors.

North wore a glittering look with gold shoes.

Strike a pose: The 38-year-old reality star rocked slouchy boots while posing with North seated on her lap for the mother-daughter photo

Kim and husband Kanye West are parents to four children together: North, Saint, three, Chicago, who turns two in January, and Psalm, five months.

Kanye recently bought a ranch just outside of Cody, Wyoming, according to TMZ; the asking price was $14 million. It is not known how much Kanye shelled out, although the website noted he did not pay full price.

The ranch has eight lodging units, two freshwater lakes, meeting facilities and an event center; the property - called Monster Lake Ranch - is nine thousand acres. Kanye owns 4,500 acres of it and the rest is leased from the federal government, the outlet reported.

Mom of four: Kim and husband Kanye West are parents to four children together: North, Saint, three, Chicago, who turns two in January, and Psalm, five months

Cutie pie: She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019

Kim shared a snap while spending time in Wyoming with Kanye and their children on September 17 while enjoying an outdoor meal during sunset.

Three days earlier, the brunette beauty shared a snap captioned 'Wyoming' with North and Chicago seated on a horse in a field with Kim holding on to the reins.

Last month Kim also attended the 71st annual Primetime Emmy Awards with her younger sister Kendall Jenner; she dazzled in a low-cut black velvet Vivienne Westwood frock and layers of jewelry from Jadelle Beverly Hills.

Relaxing:Kim shared a snap while spending time in Wyoming with Kanye and their children on September 17 while enjoying an outdoor mean during sunset

Incredible: Three days earlier, the brunette beauty shared a snap captioned 'Wyoming' with North and Chicago seated on a horse in a field with Kim holding on to the reins
description: She welcomed her fourth child Psalm via surrogate on May 9, 2019. And on Thursday, Kim Kardashian shared a sweet snap while posing with her eldest child North, six, while seated on a golden chair.
